pageContent: Objectives: To identify the factors underlying prostate cancer (PCa) patients' depression-anxiety, sexual problems, urinary dysfunction and androgen deprivation therapy (ADT)-linked breast changes and hot flushes, and test these as predictors of loss of masculinity (LoM) over 36 months following diagnosis.

metaData.source:
Re-constructing masculinity following radical prostatectomy for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21067475/
